code: import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import filter from'./Slices/filter/slice';import cart from'./Slices/cart/slice';import pizza from'./Slices/pizza/slice';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';export var store=configureStore({reducer:{filter:filter,cart:cart,pizza:pizza}});export var useAppDispatch=function useAppDispatch(){return useDispatch();};
